parameters.jsCode:
// Parse Zeal Capital Partners - static list (Gatsby site too JS-heavy to scrape)
const today = new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0];
const vcName = 'Zeal Capital Partners';

// Static portfolio list - update periodically from https://www.zealcapitalpartners.com/portfolio/
const companies = [
  { name: 'Stratyfy', url: 'https://www.stratyfy.com' },
  { name: 'Wellthi', url: 'https://www.wellthi.com' },
  { name: 'Daivergent', url: 'https://www.daivergent.com' },
  { name: 'PathMatch', url: 'https://www.pathmatch.com' },
  { name: 'EQL Finance', url: 'https://www.eqlfinance.com' },
  { name: 'Esusu', url: 'https://www.esusu.com' },
  { name: 'Rising Team', url: 'https://www.risingteam.com' },
  { name: 'Seven Starling', url: 'https://www.sevenstarling.com' },
  { name: 'AdeptID', url: 'https://www.adeptid.com' },
  { name: 'Stoovo', url: 'https://www.stoovo.com' },
  { name: 'Mobility Capital Finance', url: 'https://www.mobilitycapitalfinance.com' },
  { name: 'Finesse', url: 'https://www.finesse.us' },
  { name: 'Catch', url: 'https://www.catch.co' },
  { name: 'HireVue', url: 'https://www.hirevue.com' },
  { name: 'Kiddie Kredit', url: 'https://www.kiddiekredit.com' },
  { name: 'Papa', url: 'https://www.papa.com' },
  { name: 'Goodr', url: 'https://www.goodr.co' },
  { name: 'Mobility Credit', url: '' },
  { name: 'First Boulevard', url: 'https://www.firstboulevard.com' },
  { name: 'Greenwood', url: 'https://www.bankgreenwood.com' }
];

return companies.map(c => ({ json: {
  'Company Name': c.name,
  'VC Firm': vcName,
  'Company Description': `${c.name} - Zeal Capital Partners portfolio company (underrepresented founders)`,
  'Company URL': c.url,
  'Status': 'New',
  'First Seen Date': today,
  'Portfolio Addition Date': today,
  'Source': 'VC Portfolio'
}}));

nodes.name: Execute Enrich & Evaluate Pipeline
nodes.notes: Calls shared subworkflow for dedup, enrichment, and evaluation

nodes.name: Limit (Backfill)
nodes.notes: Remove this node after initial backfill is complete
